text: Pepe Soriano (born José Carlos Soriano; September 25, 1929 - September 13, 2023) was a well-known Argentine actor and playwright. Soriano was known for his roles in Rebellion in Patagonia, Abuela, Asesinato en el Senado de la Nación, Funes, a Great Love, and in The Last Train. Soriano was born and raised in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He died on September 13, 2023 in Buenos Aires at the age of 93.Murió Pepe Soriano a los 93 años ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.pepesorianoweb.com.ar/index.htm *http://www.recursosculturales.com.ar/blog/?p=391 *Cine Nacional * Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine playwrights Category:Writers from Buenos Aires
title: Pepe Soriano
